Package gui

Class SubscriberManagerFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.SubscriberManagerFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class SubscriberManagerFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for managing the Subscriber Manager UI. Handles subscriber-related actions such as searching, registering, viewing details, and managing borrowed books.
